Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with significant delays and congestion near Jackson due to signal problems.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with significant delays and congestion near Jackson due to signal problems.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #76 Diversey Temporary Westbound Reroute near Diversey/Wayne
ShortDescription: Westbound 76 Diversey buses are temporarily rerouted via Diversey, Racine, Fullerton, Southport and Diversey due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #76 Diversey buses are temporarily rerouted via Diversey, Racine, Fullerton, Southport and Diversey due to street blockage near Diversey/Wayne.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
